alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 11:35AM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baker and northwestern Malheur Counties through 1215 PM PDT... At 1134 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eldorado Pass, or 33 miles southwest of Baker City, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eldorado Pass around 1250 PM MDT. Ironside Mountain around 110 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
